import React from "react"; import { IoIosMenu } from "react-icons/io"; import Services from "../Services/services"; import Link from "next/link"; import { Button, Box, Icon, Collapse, Drawer, DrawerBody, DrawerFooter, DrawerOverlay, DrawerContent, useDisclosure, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { FaArrowLeft, FaChevronDown, FaChevronUp } from "react-icons/fa"; function menu(props) { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); const [services, showService] = React.useState(false); const handleToggle = () => showService(!services); const [company, showCompany] = React.useState(false); const handleToggle2 = () => showCompany(!company); return (
About Us Newsroom Our Solutions Our Partners Team Customer Stories Trainings Case Studies

); } export default menu;
